# Kokimoki SDK

The Kokimoki SDK is a comprehensive development toolkit for building real-time collaborative game applications

**ALWAYS** follow instructions defined in [`@kokimoki/app/dist/llms.txt`](https://unpkg.com/@kokimoki/app@2.0.0/dist/llms.txt) to effectively utilize the Kokimoki SDK features, including state management, media uploads, server time synchronization, leaderboards database, and AI integration
